A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Slightly better than the lousy prequel; not worth the hype at all. Whomever wrote this movie needs to be shown the power of the dark side. After \"Rogue One\,\" I thought maybe finally someone remembered how to write a good \"Star Wars\" movie; unfortunately\, the \"Force Awakens\" gave a hunt that this was not so and \"The Last Jedi\" confirmed the sad fact that \"Rogue One\" was an anomaly.
